summary: A Lore friendly male Nordic follower to be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun that only requires a vanilla install. He can be married & is also eligible for steward.
descriptionHtml:
Description

Arnljot (frightens eagles) is a Nord Follower trained to use 2 handed and heavy armor. He's a very basic follower that only relies on vanilla game assets. He can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He can be married & made steward at hearthfire homes too.

Standard Equipment
Iron Gauntlets , Armor , Shoes & a Steel Battleaxe.

He should lvl as the player does without lvl cap & is flagged as essential.

Other followers i have made that rely on vanilla assets so far:-
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49806/?

For the Nordic Retexture if you have the Dragonborn DLC and like the armour in most of the screenshots :- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34996/?

Credits
CaBaL120 for the Nordic armour retexture used in the screenshots.

Note :- The Nordic texture is not included in the files nor does Arn come with Nordic armor as i wanted him to be compatible with games without DLC.
author: chickenpasties
